summary: Build a 5-page interactive romantic website with dark theme (#20201F) and accent (#EE6E4D), serif romantic font, rounded buttons, smooth page transitions, user-uploaded images on Pages 2 and 3, playful moving 'No' button on Page 4, and a hugging-couple GIF on Page 5.
architectural_notes: All pages use theme colors #20201F (background) and #EE6E4D (accent) with a minimal romantic aesthetic.
Pages 2 and 3 must render the user-uploaded image as provided; do not substitute stock images or placeholders.
Navigation: Next button on Pages 1â€“4 (except final page); Page 4 'Yes' proceeds to Page 5.
Implement smooth transitions/animations between pages; keep buttons rounded and interactions soft.
Page 4 'No' button should change position on touch/hover to be hard to click.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Cute cartoon couple hugging animation, simple cartoon style, transparent or light background (hugging-couple.dim_600x600.gif)

Do not use stock images or placeholders for those pages.

Implement Page 4 behavior so the â€œNo ğŸ¥€â€ button playfully moves/shifts position on touch/hover/interaction to make it difficult to click, while the â€œYes ğŸŒ¹â€ button remains clickable and navigates to Page 5.

Apply and keep a consistent minimal, aesthetic, romantic design across all pages using the color theme #20201F (dark background) and #EE6E4D (accent), a clean serif romantic font for all text, soft rounded buttons, and smooth transition styling consistent with the existing transition system.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create 5-page interactive romantic website with specified texts, navigation flow, and minimal aesthetic using #20201F/#EE6E4D
Use clean serif-style romantic font site-wide, soft rounded buttons, and smooth transitions between pages
Require and display the user-uploaded image on Page 2 and Page 3 (no stock/placeholder replacements)
Page 4: Provide Yes/No buttons where No playfully moves on touch/hover to avoid easy clicking; Yes navigates to Page 5
Page 5: Display final message and a cute cartoon couple hugging GIF centered (no Next button)

projectName: Implement 5-page romantic flow with required uploaded images on Pages 2 & 3 and playful moving No button
